column4: okay, I've run into a possible reason my ati driver install isn't working, it says it's not compatible because I'm on a powerpc.  is there any way around this?
I mean, come on, they provided the card, there's got to be a way to apply the driver?  unless they're written in such intirely different ways that they're simply not applicable
I'm not aware of the ati drivers for ppc
for interest sake you may want to check the ati site for general compatability info
